definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Stomach is composed of two parts, the cardiac and pyloric region, at the first stage of mysis.
sentences.chinese: 在糠蝦幼蟲第一期，胃分爲賁門胃和幽門胃兩部分。

sentences.english: Aim To evaluate the effect of endoscopic balloon dilation for achalasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內鏡下氣囊擴張治療賁門失弛緩症的療效。

sentences.english: I was 30 years old when I was diagnosed with achalasia.
sentences.chinese: 我30歲的時候，我被診斷爲賁門失弛緩症。

sentences.english: Objective:To probe into application of helical nasointestinal tube for patients with carcinoma of gastric cardia and nursing care of them.
sentences.chinese: 探討螺旋型鼻腸管在胃賁門癌病人護理中的應用效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of prognosis with microwave hyperthermia in treating the patients with cardiac cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討微波熱療加化療對賁門腺癌預後的影響。

sentences.english: Lower part of the esophagus and the cardia were dilated once a week, 4 sessions constituting a single therapeutic course.
sentences.chinese: 每週氣囊擴張食管下段及賁門部一次，4次爲一療程。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the proper standard of the thoracoabdominal incision in patients with cardiac carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討賁門癌選擇胸腹聯合切口的合理標準。

sentences.english: A ring of muscle, the cardiac sphincter, surrounds the esophagus at this point .
sentences.chinese: 此處有一肌肉環即賁門括約肌圍繞着食道。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the application effect of mechanical anastomosis of esophago - cardiac carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討機械吻合在食管賁門癌手術中的應用效果。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of treating cardiac carcinoma with appliance anastomose via diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價經腹膈肌切開器械吻合治療賁門癌的效果。

sentences.english: Prognostic factors associated with resectable carcinoma of the esophagus.
sentences.chinese: 食管癌和賁門癌的外科治療。

sentences.english: The hardware and software of the gulp-water cardiophonography based on microcomputer are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 從硬件和軟件兩個方面介紹了微機型賁門音圖儀。

sentences.english: Manometric evaluation of the esophagus in a patient with achalasia.
sentences.chinese: 測壓評價食管賁門失弛緩症病人，在1。

sentences.english: The incidence of achalasia is approximately 1 per 100,000 people per year.
sentences.chinese: 賁門失弛緩症的發病率約爲每年每10萬1人。

sentences.english: Objective To improve X-ray diagnosis of cardiac polypus.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對賁門息肉X線診斷水平和檢出率。

sentences.english: Methods 46case of elderly patients with esophageal and cardia cancer were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析46例高齡食管癌賁門癌患者住院臨牀資料。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
